org.jboss.gravia.repository

Interface Repository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Adaptable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MavenDelegateRepository
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMavenDelegateRepository, AbstractRepository, DefaultMavenDelegateRepository, DefaultRepository, RepositoryAggregator

    public interface Repository
extends Adaptable
    A repository that contains resources.
    Since:
    11-May-2012
    Author:
    thomas.diesler@jboss.com

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the name for this repository

      • findProviders

        Collection<Capability> findProviders(Requirement requirement)
        Find the capabilities that match the specified requirement.
        Parameters:
        requirement - The requirements for which matching capabilities should be returned. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        A collection of matching capabilities for the specified requirements. If there are no matching capabilities an empty collection is returned. The returned collection is the property of the caller and can be modified by the caller.

      • findProviders

        Map<Requirement,Collection<Capability>> findProviders(Collection<Requirement> requirements)
        Find the capabilities that match the specified requirements.
        Parameters:
        requirements - The requirements for which matching capabilities should be returned. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        A map of matching capabilities for the specified requirements. Each specified requirement must appear as a key in the map. If there are no matching capabilities for a specified requirement, then the value in the map for the specified requirement must be an empty collection. The returned map is the property of the caller and can be modified by the caller.
